price: Ngaho nimunyibuke (munsingiza); nanjye nzabibuka (nzabazirikana). Kandi munshimire ntimuzampakane.
arabic: فَٱذۡكُرُونِيٓ أَذۡكُرۡكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لِي وَلَا تَكۡفُرُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-udh'kurūnī adhkur'kum wa-ush'kurū lī walā takfurūni
